Reviews.Title: “Nice new hotel, some things can still be improved”
Reviews.Author: hartmut p
Reviews.Content: hotel located ideal amsterdam center museum square close vondelpark didnt cold close leidse square hotel somethings didnt notice design nice modern building food ok price lots facilities indoor pool time staff friendly amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Very high class-best in Amsterdam”

Reviews.Content: advantage current special rates hotel public restaurants bar spa gym pool operational amazing stayed level stayed staff helpfull brasserie food compared restaurants tried amsterdam prices low tastier location shopping major museums perfect romantic weekend amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “First experience at the conservatorium - still a lot to do”
Reviews.Author: Eric G
Reviews.Content: nice hotel design nice duplex locationand gym infrastructure friendly staff practice ready services available 8 weeks laundry dry cleaning available heater duplex heater upper floor mean lower floor cold food brasserie breakfast dinner food upper restaurant bring value money available lot workers building
